body:
After some investigation it appears that the `HN` and `RC` country codes were included in the block list by mistake. I have sent two changes to remove them from the various lists:

https://go-review.googlesource.com/15082
https://go-review.googlesource.com/15083

I hope to have these fixes submitted and deployed in the next 24 hours.

I'd like to thank everyone who brought this to our attention, and apologize for any inconvenience caused.
